decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly cycling through spells to bring Arclight Phoenix back from the graveyard, utilizing card draw and cheap spells to trigger its ability. The deck also includes tempo cards like Brazen Borrower and Lightning Axe to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of cards like Temporal Trespass and Proft's Eidetic Memory provide additional win conditions and card advantage. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, allowing for the deck to quickly deploy threats and close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

The main goal of this Lotus Field combo deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Lotus Field, Sylvan Scrying, and Vizier of Tumbling Sands, while controlling the board with cards like Strict Proctor and Archdruid's Charm. The deck aims to use Emergent Ultimatum and Hidden Strings to search for key pieces like Omniscience and generate value. By using cards like Dark Petition and Fae of Wishes, the deck can find the right answers to disrupt opponent's strategies and win the game through a powerful combo finish.

This Pioneer 1 vs 1 Spirit Aggro deck focuses on aggressively controlling the board with efficient creature threats like Mausoleum Wanderer and Spell Queller, backed up by disruptive spells like Spell Pierce and Portable Hole. The deck leverages the synergies between Spirit tribal support cards like Supreme Phantom and Rattlechains to overwhelm opponents quickly. The inclusion of Enduring Curiosity and No More Lies allows for card advantage in longer games. The mana base is optimized for consistent early plays and efficient color fixing. Mutavault provides additional creature threats while maintaining synergy with the tribal theme.

The main focus of this deck is to combine the powerful abilities of Atraxa, Grand Unifier with cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Indomitable Creativity to create explosive combos that can overwhelm the opponent quickly. The deck also includes a mix of counter spells and card draw to support the combo pieces, while also including a few removal options like Prismari Command and Volcanic Spite to handle threats from the opponent. The deck aims to be creative in its approach to winning games by assembling unique and powerful combinations of cards.

The deck focuses on using Enigmatic Incarnation to sacrifice and tutor for powerful creatures, utilizing control elements such as Leyline Binding and Vanishing Verse to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional value with its blink ability, while the companion mechanic allows for a guaranteed extra card in hand. The deck aims to outvalue and outcontrol the opponent, utilizing a variety of powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Archon of Emeria to secure victory.
